alert.note: Alert for Southwest Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Phillips County through 415 PM MDT... At 315 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Zortman, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Zortman, Fourchette, Landusky and Sun Prairie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
